survey_name: Customer Satisfaction Survey for Solar Panel Installation Services
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback from customers who have recently installed solar panels to assess their satisfaction with the installation process, service quality, and overall experience.

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the overall solar panel installation process?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale to measure satisfaction levels. Ensure the scale is balanced and clearly labeled.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the overall solar panel installation process?

questions.question_text: Which of the following aspects of the installation process met your expectations? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Allow multiple selections to capture varied feedback on different aspects of the service.

script.question_text: Which of the following aspects of the installation process met your expectations? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: How would you rate the quality of the solar panels installed?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point scale to assess perceived quality. Ensure the options are clear and unambiguous.

script.question_text: How would you rate the quality of the solar panels installed?

questions.question_text: Please describe any issues or challenges you encountered during the installation process.
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to capture detailed feedback. Ensure the text box is large enough for comprehensive responses.

script.question_text: Please describe any issues or challenges you encountered during the installation process.

questions.question_text: Would you recommend our solar panel installation services to others?
questions.client_notes: Simple yes/no question to gauge likelihood of recommendation. Include a 'Not sure' option for neutrality.
